short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Every search helps fund your local school

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Binbee is a dedicated search page for participating schools. After you've chosen your school, revenue from searches goes to your school. 

When you install the extension Binbee becomes your default search engine and new tab page. 

Binbee Search is powered by Bing. 

Help your school everyday just by searching and surfing the web!
